<!-- âœ… Only load DataTables plugin (assumes jQuery is already loaded by Quarto) -->
<link rel="stylesheet"
      href="https://cdn.datatables.net/2.3.2/css/jquery.dataTables.min.css">
<script src="https://cdn.datatables.net/2.3.2/js/jquery.dataTables.min.js"></script>

## News articles and blog posts using the data

<table id="rss-table" class="display" style="width:100%">
  <thead>
    <tr><th>Title</th><th>Published</th><th>Link</th></tr>
  </thead>
</table>

<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
  fetch("/news_feed.json")
    .then(res => res.json())
    .then(data => {
      if (!$.fn.DataTable) {
        console.error("DataTables plugin not loaded!");
        return;
      }

      $('#rss-table').DataTable({
        data: data,
        columns: [
          { data: 'title' },
          {
            data: 'published',
            render: d => new Date(d).toLocaleString()
          },
          {
            data: 'link',
            render: d => `<a href="${d}" target="_blank">View</a>`
          }
        ],
        order: [[1, 'desc']]
      });
    })
    .catch(err => console.error("Error loading JSON:", err));
});
</script>
